vsParam:
Hmm...
If I adopt this method, then I need to use this formula...

Hmm... What's wrong with Sorel?
She's reading a reference book of wizardology, right!?

I'm not sure... But Sorel is studying.
Could it be an omen of something really bad!?

Hey, you! I heard that!
I'm just studying magic very hard, OK!
Is it required for the next lesson?

Er, I'm studying wind magic.
I'll be able to fly when I master this!

No, it's not for my lesson...
I'm studying wind magic. If I master it, I'll be able to fly!

Right? But I haven't succeeded not even once.
I couldn't imagine the feeling of flying in the sky...

Er, imagine?
Why do you have to imagine?

Er... The key to using magic,
is to imagine the picture of using it in your mind...

Take fire magic, you have to imagine the picture of lighting a fire.
And flying magic requires you to imagine yourself flying in the sky.

Hmm~? Isn't this very easy to imagine?
Just flap to fly, flap, flap.

Ha-ha, that's because you have wings...
Is there a way to fly without wings?

Without wings... Ah, right!
Hehehe, I've got a good idea!

You've heard about the type of monsters floating in the air, right?
Perhaps we can find inspiration by observing them!

Uhâ€”!? Hey, using monsters as a reference, are you serious!?
You'll definitely get attacked!

Hmm, it's alright.
I'll kill them if they dare attack me.

OK, you guys will help me, right?
For my wind magic... Please, guys!
